summary: The implementation successfully addresses most requirements for adding artist profile creation with Stripe configuration. All backend changes (User type with isArtist field, updateArtistStatus mutation, user-scoped Stripe storage) and frontend changes (Settings page, Header navigation, artist status hooks, CreateItemForm checks) are present. However, the diff summary is truncated, limiting verification of complete implementation details for Stripe configuration scoping and payment processing updates.

missing_requirements.requirement: Payment processing uses the seller's Stripe configuration when processing item purchases
missing_requirements.reason: Diff shows backend Stripe configuration storage structure (stripeConfigs map) but does not show evidence of updated payment processing logic to use seller-specific Stripe configuration during checkout/purchase flows
